pages.text: 23|75|ara yadi amara taderake daya kari ebam tadera duhkha-dain'ya dura kari tabu'o tara abadhyataya bibhrantera n'yaya ghurate thakabe.
23|76|Ara abasya'i amara taderake sasti dbara pakara'o karalama, tarapara'o tara tadera rabera prati binata hala na ebam katara prarthana'o karala na [1].
23|77|Abasese yakhana amara tadera upara kathina kono sastira duyara khule deba takhana'i tara ete asahata haye parabe [1].
23|78|Ara tini'i tomadera jan'ya kana, cokha o antakarana srsti karechena; tomara khuba alpa'i krtajnata prakasa kare thaka.
23|79|Ara tini'i tomaderake yamine bistrta karechena [1] ebam tomaderake tamra'i kache ekatra kara habe.
23|80|Ara tini'i jibita karena ebam mrtyu dena ara tamra'i adhikare rata o dinera paribartana [1]. Tabu'o ki tomara bujhabe na
23|82|Tara bale, ‘amadera mrtyu ghatale ebam amara mati o asthite parinata hale'o ki amara punarut'thita haba
23|83|amaderake to e bisaye'i pratisruti pradana kara hayeche ebam atite amadera purbapurusaderake'o. Eta to purbabartidera upakatha chara ara kichu'i naya.’
23|84|Baluna, ‘yamine ebam ete ya kichu ache egulo(ra malikana) kara? Yadi tomara jana (tabe bala).’
23|85|Abasya'i tara balabe, ‘allah‌ra.’ Baluna, ‘tabu'o ki tomara siksa grahana karabe na?’
23|87|Abasya'i tara balabe, ‘allah‌.’ Baluna, ‘tabu'o ki tomara taka'oya abalambana karabe na?’
23|88|Baluna, ‘kara hate samasta bastura kartrtba? Yini asraya pradana karena athaca tamra bipakse ke'u ka'uke asraya dite pare na [1], yadi tomara jana (tabe bala).’
23|89|Abasya'i tara balabe, ‘allah‌.’ Baluna, ‘tahale kotha theke tomara jadukrta haccho?’
